alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Niihau (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 02 at 9:52AM HST until December 02 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI HAS BEEN CANCELLED... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND WEST FACING SHORES OF BIG ISLAND THROUGH 6 PM TODAY... .The large, long period west northwest swell (300-310 degrees) that peaked last night will continue to slowly subside through today. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH SURF WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Surf 12 to 16 feet. * WHERE...North and west-facing shores of Niihau and Kauai. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
